channel.title: Voting :/ I have no idea
channel.description:
Ok so I have. A website hosted on webEden but I don't know how to add voting to it as I want to add a vote4cash but I feel it'. Impossible because of my website
Anyone know how to do it or where I should make another website where I can do this

item.title: Voting :/ I have no idea
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Well you can set up xamp and make a voting script there, and have a link on your website that takes you to that.
Or you can use a host like x10hosting or 000webhost and pay for a hosting plan, and then set it up there.

Read full topic
